Career Highlights
Company          : Numeric Power System Ltd.
Position    :  Service Engineer
Duration    : May 2011 – Jan 2012.
Company Profile
                        Numeric Power System Ltd  an  INDIA’S  No :1 UPS Company in Chennai  
manufacturing a UPS (800 watts to 50 KW), Invertors ( 500 watts to 2 KVA)  and Stabilers 
( 1KVA to 20 KVA).  
Roles and Responsibilities
Taking care of overall maintenance of  UPS ,Invertors & Stabilers in our customer 
locations.                                                                                                                                
Electrical drawing study and performing connections as per drawing.
Verifying the Electronic boards and circuits.
Implemented recovery scheme for unwanted damages and appreciated by organization.
.
Career Highlights
Company          : M/S Toolfab Engineering Industries (P) Ltd
Department      : Maintenance
Position    :  Jr.Engineer
Duration    : Feb 2012 – till date.
Company Profile
Toolfab Engineering Industries (P) Ltd an ISO 9001:2008 certified leading 
fabrication company in Trichy manufacturing Windmill Towers, Pressure parts, Heavy steel 
structures for Boiler and General Industries. We manufactured Asia’s first largest 2MW 
Windmill Tower through M/S Suzlon Energy Ltd.
Roles and Responsibilities
Taking care of overall maintenance of electrical appliances in our company.                      
Electrical drawing study and performing connections as per drawing.
Taking care of welding machines and other machineries. 
Taking care of EOT maintenance and all portable kit servicing. 
Carrying out repair work for electrical instruments and devices.
Taking care of cabling work inside and outside of bay. 
Implemented recovery scheme for unwanted damages and appreciated by organization.Personal Profile
